instructions: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX name: <[ontology_name_var]> SELECT ?task_name ?field_name ?field_type ?values WHERE {  ?task name:tasks_order "[task_order_var]". ?current_language rdfs:label "[language_var]"@en. ?task rdfs:label ?task_name. ?task rdf:type name:tasks. ?task name:has_instructios ?field. ?field rdfs:comment ?field_name. ?field name:has_field_type ?f_type. ?f_type rdfs:comment ?field_type. ?field name:possible_values ?instr_possible_values. ?instr_possible_values rdfs:comment ?values. ?instr_possible_values name:relate_to_task ?task. ?instr_possible_values name:relate_to_language ?current_language. ?current_language rdf:type name:text_languages. }
outputs: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX name: <[ontology_name_var]> SELECT DISTINCT ?task_name ?field_name ?field_type ?values ?for_intent WHERE {?task name:tasks_order "[task_order_var]". ?current_language rdfs:label "[language_var]"@en. ?task rdf:type name:tasks. ?current_language rdf:type name:text_languages. ?task rdfs:label ?task_name. ?task name:has_output ?output_template. ?output_template name:has_output_field ?output_field. ?output_field rdfs:comment ?field_name. ?output_field name:has_field_type ?output_field_type. ?output_field_type rdfs:comment ?field_type. ?output_field name:possible_values ?output_possible_values. ?output_possible_values rdfs:comment ?values. ?output_possible_values name:relate_to_task ?task. ?output_possible_values name:relate_to_language ?current_language. ?output_possible_values name:relate_to_output ?output_template. OPTIONAL {?output_template name:relate_to_intent ?provided_intent. ?provided_intent rdfs:comment ?for_intent. ?task name:tasks_order "3". }}
inputs: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX name: <[ontology_name_var]> SELECT ?task_name ?field_name ?field_type ?values WHERE {?task name:tasks_order "[task_order_var]". ?current_language rdfs:label "[language_var]"@en. ?task rdf:type name:tasks. ?task rdfs:label ?task_name. ?current_language rdf:type name:text_languages. ?task name:has_input_field ?input_field. ?input_field rdfs:comment ?field_name. ?input_field name:has_field_type ?input_field_type. ?input_field_type rdfs:comment ?field_type. OPTIONAL {?input_field name:possible_values ?input_possible_values. ?input_possible_values rdfs:comment ?values. }}
